information.name: mkt-queue-sync
information.description: Synchronises UCRM services with a MikroTik simple queue https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/Manual:Queue
information.author: Franco Johan Gampel - franco@gampel.com.ar, Thomas Jones - me@thomasjones.id.au

configuration.label: MikroTik: IP address
configuration.description: The IP address of the MikroTik

configuration.label: MikroTik: API port
configuration.description: The port the RouterOS standard API service is presently on (leave blank to use default 8728)

configuration.label: MikroTik: Username
configuration.description: The service account username for the MikroTik

configuration.label: MikroTik: Password
configuration.description: The service account password for the MikroTik

configuration.label: Burst Limit Percentage
configuration.description: Burst Limit Percentage calculated over the service's max-limit, in U/D format (upload/download speeds in Mbps.) If not used, enter 0 here

configuration.label: Burst Time
configuration.description: Burst Time (if not used, enter 1 here)

configuration.label: Limit At %
configuration.description: Limit at percentage calculated over the max limit. Use values 1-99.

configuration.label: Add a Queue
configuration.description: Add a simple queue in the event it's not present on the device?

configuration.label: UISP: API token
configuration.description: API token created for this plugin in the UISP network application (under Users)
